text: Tsya kotra povaha obryady ukhvaleni BOHOM zasluzhyly harnu vynahorodu u yikhnʹomu Lordi. Vsiy domashniy khudobi robytʹsya zakonne dlya vashoho prodovolʹstva, krim dlya tsykh spetsialʹno zaboronenoho dlya vas. Vy budete unyknuty abomination idola obozhnyuyete, ta unykayete nosyatʹ nevirnoho svidka
